title: Embroidered Picture, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool, silk
Technique: counted stitch embroidery on plain weave
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased by Myra Fraser Martin from Mrs. Conover in the summer of 1937.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Portrait of Queen Victoria as a young woman, possibly at her coronation in 1837.  Unfinished.

tombstone.epitaph:
